summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on September 19, 2003. It includes information about discounts applied and payment instructions, as well as shipment details for a package sent by NYSG LLC.

persons.name: Lauren Kvantner
persons.context: Lauren Kvantner is listed as the sender associated with NYSG LLC on the invoice.

persons.name: Paul Hoffman
persons.context: Paul Hoffman is mentioned as the recipient associated with his law office in St. Thomas.

connections.description: Lauren Kvantner is the sender of the package, while Paul Hoffman is the recipient, indicating a business transaction.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated September 19, 2003, and details charges for FedEx services.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $18.63 after discounts.
The sender is Lauren Kvantner from NYSG LLC, and the recipient is Paul Hoffman from his law office in St. Thomas.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge and a discount applied to the total charges.
The payment is due by October 4, 2003.
